新药在阿尔茨海默氏症的鼠模型中显示出神经保护作用和抗炎作用阿尔茨海默氏病是目前无法治愈的痴呆症最常见原因。当前可用的药物具有非常有限的功效，并且仅在疾病的轻度阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/new-drug-shows-neurprotactive-and-and-anti-infammeffects-inflammefts-in-murine-murine-models-of-alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/new-drug-shows-neurprotactive-and-andi-infammeffects-inflammefts-in-murine-murine-models-models-of-alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c66658-1b8b-44de-8D26-218077C4BB98 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 13:31:00 -0400 New drug shows neuroprotective and anti-inflammatory effects in murine models of Alzheimer's
